NOTE: If your using any other gamepad than Xbox360, you might have alot of trouble with this game. If the game detects a contoller, it automaticlly thinks it's an Xbox360 controller; I'm using a generic PS3 gamepad with Xpadder. To trick the game into going into mouse and keyboard mode, just plug in your controller, load the xpadder profile then unplug your contoller and start the game, when in the game, plug in your contoller back in and off you go; the games not bad by the way.

2. plug off all gamepad, joystick or whatever alike. cause it will mess up game control and trust me. this can best play by mouse and key board cause it easy for you to do many challenges that will unlocked new guns for you.

FYI: it seems all blackbox releases are English only. This release is less than HALF in size compared to the Skidrow release, which contains all the other languages and voiceovers. Audio can take such a nasty amount of space. Also, I think I read the cutscenes were re-encoded in this release, to make them smaller. From 1080p to 720p. I, for one, am not too concerned that the video quality is much worse. Perfectly justifiable re-encode, in order to cram this game into smaller size.

Size does matter :)

I want to see more of these English only releases. I have to ask, do the French or the Italians or the Spanish use their first language in games, or do you switch to English whenever possible?

Why are new Games so huge in size??

"Prevent easy spread of illegal copies of your software - Imagine you just publish a new software with a size of 56MB onto a CD. You can fill the the remaining 644MB free CD space with fake files. If you cannot stop the crackers, you can still slow them down. People who try to transfer your software over the internet will have to spend longer time, while the authentic users who purchased your CD will not be affected."

Source: http://www.mynikko.com/dummy/

GOT IT WORKING!!! If you have the "Device is removed: device due to badly hung Formed commands" ERROR, simply increase the voltage in your video card. 

I increased the voltage from the stock 1.000mV in my GTX 580 to 1.050mV. It's working now!!!!

I'm running Windows 8 Consumer Preview 64-bit

Just a shitty Ubisoft release. People who paid are having the same problems. 

The "Device is removed: device due to badly hung Formed commands" was a problem that first cropped up with BF3. The fix was to either underclock or overclock your GPU. 

 I experience that with both the Skidrow and BB repack. Actually the BB repack also just freezes on me, too.

I can confirm that the "Device is removed: device due to badly hung Formed commands" does have to do with an overclocked GPU. Mine is a factory overclocked GTX570 and I upped my voltage and now the game works. Lowering my voltage caused the game to crash immediately.

So that particular error has to do with overclocking and voltage, and can be solved easily. Use MSI afterburner and add just a small amount of voltage.

my crashing seems to have stopped once i increased the voltage but now i have another problem where my fps will drop to around 5-10 for about a minute or two then it will jack back up to normal. If its doing that and i hit the tab button on my keyboard the fps will jack back up immediatley...... why on earth is it doing this and why is tab or escape seem to fix this problem? (i use a controller so i dont want to be bothered pressing tab or esc on my keyboard everytime i want to get a steady framerate in game)

MOUSE: documentsUbisoftTom Clancy`sProfilename user61546 (my case)controls.ini

find this part of the file

[eActionLookUpDownPC]
key=MousePosY
behavior=
customSens=1.000000
[eActionLookLeftRightPC]
key=MousePosX
behavior=
customSens=1.000000

and complete whith: Pressed

[eActionLookUpDownPC]
key=MousePosY
behavior=Pressed
customSens=1.000000
[eActionLookLeftRightPC]
key=MousePosX
behavior=Pressed
customSens=1.000000

@5HARD go to settings in the bottom right and check the box that says "Start the launcher in offline mode". Click apply and try logging in again :)

Hey guys! I have found the solution how to fix your problems and errors with Ghost Recon Future Soldier. 
1. Copy the crack into game folder.
2. (When u try to run the game, most of the people are getting error.) All u should is right click on game shortcut and run as administrator.
3. As u run it as administrator, the ubisoft log in tab will pop up. First of all click on settings, and tick the box "start the launcher in offline mode and click apply.
4. Then type in anything in some random crap in username and password, tick remember me box below and click log in
5.Then the error will come up "Cannot play in offline mode blah blah blah, just click "PLAY!" and the game will start.
Tell me if it works for u 
Enjoy!!!

Bypass this Blackbox release because it's poorly ripped.

Updates 1.2 and 1.3 install in C:Windows, that's because the update installers look for a valid install, which the blackbox never offers.

Update 1.4 crashes because ripped files are altered and thus they cannot be patched.

So if you have issues that are fixed in the updates, go get the full 12,8GB release and all will be installed properly.

Apply the 1.4 skidrow fix only update and all is well.

Also go to ehow com and search for removing pnkbstra when using the full release.
